updateRecurring

public void updateRecurring(java.lang.Boolean recurring,
                            int duration,
                            int durationType,
                            java.lang.Long frequency)
Update the recurrance logic of the filter. If recurring is Boolean.TRUE, set the filter to be active for duration time units every frequency; the time units are given by durationType. The frequency is one of the constants mentioned in Filter.setRecurringFrequency(java.lang.Long)

Parameters:
recurring - whether the filter is recurring or not
duration - the number of time units the filter is active for
durationType - one of Calendar.YEAR, Calendar.WEEK_OF_YEAR, Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY
frequency - the frequency with which the filter is activated, as described in Filter.setRecurringFrequency(java.lang.Long)

disableRecurring

public void disableRecurring()
Disable recurring for this Filter. This sets the: filter.recurring = false filter.recurringduration = null filter.recurringdurationtype = null

setFilterType

public void setFilterType(java.lang.String filterType)
Set the type of the filter

Parameters:
filterType - the new filter type

storeFilter

public void storeFilter()
Store the filter

updateScope

public void updateScope(MatchType mt,
                        java.lang.String[] values)
Update the scope of the filter to only match on the values given in values

Parameters:
mt - the match type
values - the objects

getScope

public java.lang.String getScope()
Get the scope for the match type of the filter, defaults to the scope of MatchType.SCOUT

Returns:
the scope for the match type of the filter

updateStates

public void updateStates(java.lang.String[] values)
Update the probe states for which the filter matches to values. The values must be one of the constants in MonitoringConstants.PROBE_STATES

Parameters:
values - the new probe state values on which the filter matches

getCriteriaValues

public java.lang.String[] getCriteriaValues(MatchType mt)
Return the values of all criteria that have the given match type

Parameters:
mt - the match type for which to return criteria values
Returns:
the values of criteria with the given match type

updateMatch

public void updateMatch(java.lang.String pattern,
                        java.lang.Boolean matchCase)
Update the criteria related to pattern matching on filter output. If match is null, all match related criteria will be removed. If it is non-null, all match related criteria are replaced by one criterion that matches on the given match string.

Parameters:
pattern - the regex pattern to match against. This must be a valid Perl5 regex.
matchCase - whether the regex match should be case-sensitive or not

updateContactGroups

public void updateContactGroups(java.lang.String[] groups)
Update the criteria that filter by contact group. If groups is null or an empty array, all criteria matching on contact group will be deleted.

Parameters:
groups - the new groups to filter by.

setEmailAddresses

public void setEmailAddresses(java.lang.String[] addresses)
Set the email addresses for this filter to the addresses

Parameters:
addresses - the new list of email addresses
